title: Club Problems
body:
So i have made a club some months back with some of my friends i had no problem with it until now .
Now when i go log in my account im not in the club anymore when i click view your clubs and chat rooms beneth clubs is a big 0/3 .On my friends accounts im still in the club and club leader which i was before this problem but on my account nothing
 When we play a game they have the club tag but i dont  i didant quit the club or something like that before this .
sry for bad english

replies.body: I have the same problem could some one help me?

We can address this issue if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) into this. We may have to twist some knobs and push some buttons, but we should be able to resolve this together.
